flawed_nl_solution:
Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=12>>12 inches per year.
To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
It will take her a total of 24 / 12 = <<24/12=2>>2 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 2 = <<12+2=14>>14 years old when she achieves the world record.
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.2000000000000002, not 12. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
